::Prowl/FZ/Kluster/Lavatron/Perndabot/Grimmler/Havoc::

Prowl swirls, avoiding several shots and a charging FZ. He fires two 
missiles, both of which FZ takes out with a quickly brought up 
automatic rifle. Prowl recieves Iron Raptor's thoughs, and could feel 
her pain, but right now he had his own problems.

He growls as Perndabot's huge arms grab him from behind, sending the 
two bots plummeting downwards. Prowl's sets his boosters to maximum 
burn, flying upward and charring Perndabot's torso. Perndabot holds 
on, one of his arms encircling Prowl's neck and beginning to strangle 
the Maximal.

Prowl growls again. They were flying over Iron Raptor and the 
Alliance bots attacking her now. Prowl couldn't see them due to 
Perndabot forcing his head up, but he could sense them through the 
orbs on his wings.

"Beast mode!" Prowl transforms into his beast mode, leaving a 
surprised Perndabot to fly forward on his own. Two quick shots from 
Prowl disable Perndabot's jetpack, sending the huge bot plummeting 
down toward Nemsis Enforcer, Prowl's telekinetic ability helping him 
along.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler dives to the ground, evading several shots. Seeing Ratchet 
firing at Manterror, Grimmler turns his fire toward Scattershot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster barely hears Chordate's transmission in the mist of battle.

"Yes, you are authorized to lockdown," Kluster says. Better to have a 
base than not, he figured as he fired at Manterror.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc watches Minion and Chaos fly off. So much for the tranport pod. 
He transforms into his vehicle mode.

"Get in," he says, opening his cockpit for Vlad.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Response to Iron Raptor's "Repairs" post is in this e-mail)
> 
> Oblitertron (gestalt)/Dark Wolf (gestalt)/Defensor 
(gestalt)/Sixshot/Double 
> Punch/
> Injecotr/Manterror/Bumblebee/Beeline/Ares/Nemesis 
> Enforcer/Scattershot/Firestarter/Unitron/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Oblitertron looked at Defensor with disgust and raised his rifle, 
launching 
> off three bolts from the weapon of war.  He got up as Defensor 
staggered back 
> from the force of the blast.
> 
> ---
> 
> The Maximal gestalt watched as Oblitertron ran forward as fast as 
he could, 
> shoulder pointed in Defensor's direction.  Defensor bent down and 
prepared to 
> uppercut, but  realized he'd been tricked by the enemy gestalt when 
> Oblitertron fired off a single charged optic blast, stabbing into 
his left 
> shoulder and knocking him back, almost stumbling to the ground.
> 
> Defensor raised his arms as Oblitertron raised his rifle and 
wrapped his 
> black finger around the trigger and began to pull it back.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Wolf charged another ball of blue sizzling energy, and tossed 
it at Sky 
> Lynx.  If Oblitertron fell, Dark Wolf would be on top of Defensor 
quickly.  
> If Defensor fell though, Dark Wolf would stil be on top of him 
quickly.
> 
> ---
> 
> Ares watched the four missiles go towards Sixshot, and fired off 
three 
> precise bolts from his rifle at the missiles and wathced the three 
explosions.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sixshot felt pain as a missile struck into his already dented and 
burned 
> armor.  This form wasn't maneuverable for the kind of battle going 
on 
> currently.  He swerved his dual batteries, chargin them, and firing 
two 
> blasts from the two cannons in each battery.
> As the eight blasts from the laser cannons lanced out at Sky Lynx, 
Sixshot 
> transformed into his biped mode, a hypersonic concussion blaster in 
each hand 
> and charging up.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch did a back flip as Beeline, his cyberbee, dove, firing 
off four 
> optic blasts, intercepting the three missiles incoming at its 
master and a 
> charge heading for Bumblebee.  It pulled up, its little engines 
barely able 
> to handle the fast-paced maneuvers it was executing.
> 
> Double Punch felt a few shots out of the numerous fired strike his 
back as he 
> did the flip and he stumbled, raising a pincher and launching off 
two energy 
> signature seeking missiles at Sideswipe.  He moved his right 
pincher, firing 
> off a single missile of the same type at Torca.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector raised the side of him with the stinger up and pulled 
upward hard, a 
> dozen of the shots striking him in his armored thorax, sending him 
spinning.  
> He regained control, though upside down, and lowered the part of 
him with the 
> stinger, and fired off two stinger missiles at Ratchet, a little 
> disorientated from the quick maneuver.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror was struck in the abdomen by the tusk missile, letting 
out a loud 
> grunt of pain.  He raised an arm, firing off four ion disks at 
Ratchet's left 
> knee.
> 
> ---
> 
> Bumblebee watched as the charge exploded several meters in front of 
him 
> before it could explode against its intended target.  He shrugged, 
not 
> knowing where it came from but he wasn't unhappy about it.  He 
raised both 
> arms, the hands at the ends of the mechanical arms holding a 
stinger missile 
> launcher.  From each stinger missile launcher went out two stinger 
missiles, 
> four in all heading for Torca's chestplate.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher yelled out as the charge struck him in the chest head 
on and 
> knocked him to his back.  He moaned, slowly getting up.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector heard Sun Crusher's yell and raised his rifle, firing off 
four 
> bolts at Torca in retaliation for his comrade's pain.
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer watched the unsuspecting Iron Raptor, keeping his 
face that 
> of anger instead of the smile that wanted to form on his metallic 
lips.  He 
> watched the explosion, and her hit the ground.
> 
> He raised his rifle, the barrel pointing downward at Iron Raptor's 
already 
> damaged torso.  He raised an arm and pointed down at Iron Raptor, 
trying to 
> signal Scattershot to kill her.  The high ranking Alliance member 
doubted 
> Defensor would attack him, but he didn't want to take any chances.  
But, when 
> watching Iron Raptor squirm, he laughed.
> 
> He fired off five rapid laser blasts from his rifle at Iron 
Raptor's torso, 
> the shots just being pot shots.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot threw his head back harder and burst out in an even 
more sadistic 
> laugh.
> "What's that, Unicron?  Finish her and bring her spark to you?  
Well...if you 
> insist..." he smiled, ignoring Iron Raptor's signs of pain.  He was 
a little 
> interested as to why she wasn't returning fire.  Scattershot 
decided she was 
> just in too much pain.  Best to keep her in that state.  He raised 
his own 
> rifle, firing off twelve rounds of armor-piercing shells at Iron 
Raptor's 
> right shoulder.  
> 
> "Best to pick a spot and keep shooting." he laughed, whistling at 
> Oblitertron's comeback on Defensor.  "That's going to be fun to 
intervene in 
> when Mega-Witch is deceased and dead.  Doesn't she have a 
boyfriend?" he 
> asked himself, initiating scans for Prowl's location. 
> 
> "Aha!" he yelled.  He'd found Prowl.  He would keep his internal 
sensors on 
> Prowl so he could track him.  When Iron Raptor was dead, he'd kill 
Prowl 
> next.  Of course, Prowl could be one of his big hero types and 
might try and 
> save Iron Raptor.  So if Prowl headed in their direction, he'd 
know.  
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron fired off two more missiles, each striking the main entry 
way of the 
> Cybertronian Fire.  "This is rather irritating.  Maybe we should go 
for one 
> of the small access hatches in the side, Firestarter.  Maybe one 
closer to 
> the bridge."
> 
> ---
> 
> The other robot thought for a second at Unitron's 
words.  "Hmmm..."  He 
> looked at the side of the CF they were facing and made his 
decision.  He 
> raised both arms, firing off a missile from each compartment in the 
bottom of 
> his forearms, both missiles striking the dmaaged entry way, but it 
didn't 
> blow open.
> 
> "This side is undefended by missile launchers.  No one in 
interfering with us 
> as of yet.  Moving would make us have to deal with a missile 
launcher and 
> possibly Maximals.  Here is fine for now."
> 
> He looked to Unitron, and got his answer when two dozen rapid bolts 
of laser 
> energy flew from the robot's nosecone and struck the entry way of 
the 
> Cybertronian Fire.  
> 
> =
> 
> Chordate yelled out as he felt the base shake from the numerous 
missiles 
> striking the Cybertronian Fire's hull.  "Hull integrity is lowered 
down to 
> 81%." he said to himself.  "The entry way those people are working 
down is at 
> a 70% integrity."
> 
> He activated his comm. unit.  "Kluster?  What is your response?  
Yes or no?  
> You have to decide now." He brought up a visual on the two bots 
attacking the 
> entry way.  One was in a space fighter mode, the other hovering in 
a biped 
> mode.  He'd never seen either of them before.  Of course, he hadn't 
seen over 
> two-thirds of the enemies of the Maximals, so that fact didn't 
really matter. 
>  He turned in his chair to look at Hysteria better.
> 
> The hyena bot was rather small.  She didn't look that strong, 
rather puny in 
> Chordate's opinion.  -No, she can't take those two on- he said, 
turning back 
> to face the screens.  His hands flashed like lightning over the 
secondary 
> control system, the main one destroyed.
> He had the autoguns go online, but stay in the ceiling, and the 
flame 
> throwers in the side of the walls power up throughout the Maxi 
warship.  He 
> doubted the internal defenses would stop most of the robots his 
Maximal 
> comrades were facing though.
